name: Save That Money
description:
Every month you are presented with 3 opportunities. Some of these are optional, while others happen whether you like it or not. Each opportunity will affect your cash on hand or your monthly income or expenses.  To move on to the next month, either accept or reject all opportunities for the current month.
To view a breakdown of your current income and expenses, click on the respective button on the left.
Keep an eye on your total cash, as you will lose if you remain in debt for 12 consecutive months.

To win, increase your passive income to cover all of your expenses
